description: This file defines the NotesProvider class, a state management class for handling notes in a Flutter application. It manages loading, creating, updating, and deleting notes from a Supabase backend, and provides methods for setting search queries and categories, along with notifying listeners about state changes.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages the state of notes, interfacing with a Supabase backend to perform CRUD operations and manage search and category filters.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from the database, applying category and search filters, and updates the local notes list.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Inserts a new note into the database and adds it to the local notes list.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note in the database and reloads the notes list.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Removes a note from the database and the local list.

methods.name: setSearchQuery
methods.description: Sets the search query string and reloads notes based on the new query.

methods.name: setCategory
methods.description: Sets the selected category filter and reloads notes accordingly.
